trans-unit.source: Represents an XML digital signature or XML encryption <xref uid="langword_csharp_<KeyInfo>" name="<KeyInfo>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: 代表 XML 數位簽章或 XML 加密<xref uid="langword_csharp_<KeyInfo>" name="<KeyInfo>" href=""></xref>項目。

trans-unit.source: The KeyInfo class represents key information in XML digital signing and encryption.
trans-unit.target: KeyInfo 類別代表 XML 數位簽章與加密的金鑰資訊。

trans-unit.source: The KeyInfo class enables you to imbed key-related information intended to help identify the key necessary for validating or decrypting the XML document.
trans-unit.target: KeyInfo 類別可讓您嵌入用來協助找出所需的驗證或解密 XML 文件的金鑰的金鑰的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: Multiple types of key-related information can be included within a single KeyInfo; each type of key-related information has an associated class derived from <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoClause>.
trans-unit.target: 多個類型的索引鍵相關的資訊可以包含單一的 KeyInfo; 內每一種金鑰的相關資訊具有相關聯的類別衍生自<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoClause>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoClause>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the `<KeyInfo>` element, see the XMLDSIG specification, which is available from the W3C at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/, or see the XML encryption specification, which is available from the W3C at www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關`<KeyInfo>`項目，請參閱 XMLDSIG 規格，可用於在 www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/ w3c，或請參閱 XML 加密規格，可從在 www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/ W3C。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoClause"></xref> that represents a particular type of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo"></xref> information to the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 新增<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoClause"></xref>代表特定類型的<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo"></xref>資訊<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoClause"></xref> to add to the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoClause"> </xref>加入<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoClause"></xref> objects contained in the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得數目<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoClause"></xref>所包含的物件<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The number of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoClause"></xref> objects contained in the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 數目<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoClause"></xref>所包含的物件<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoClause"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的列舉值<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoClause"></xref>中的物件<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Two enumerators taken from the same collection at the same time are not necessarily required to return the same iteration.
trans-unit.target: 從相同的集合，在同一時間的兩個列舉值不一定需要傳回相同的重複項目。

trans-unit.source: Initially, the enumerator must be positioned before the first element of the collection and must be advanced by the caller of the implementation before use.
trans-unit.target: 一開始，列舉值必須位於集合中的第一個項目之前，必須由呼叫者的實作，才能使用進階。

trans-unit.source: An enumerator of the subelements of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo"></xref> that can be used to iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: 元素的子元素的列舉值<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo"> </xref> ，可用來逐一查看集合。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoClause"></xref> objects of the specified type in the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的列舉值<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoClause"></xref>物件中指定之型別的<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Two enumerators taken from the same collection at the same time are not necessarily required to return the same iteration.
trans-unit.target: 從相同的集合，在同一時間的兩個列舉值不一定需要傳回相同的重複項目。

trans-unit.source: Initially, the enumerator must be positioned before the first element of the collection and must be advanced by the caller of the implementation before use.
trans-unit.target: 一開始，列舉值必須位於集合中的第一個項目之前，必須由呼叫者的實作，才能使用進階。

trans-unit.source: The type of object to enumerate.
trans-unit.target: 要列舉的物件類型。

trans-unit.source: An enumerator of the subelements of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo"></xref> that can be used to iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: 元素的子元素的列舉值<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo"> </xref> ，可用來逐一查看集合。

trans-unit.source: Returns the XML representation of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的 XML 表示法<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The XML representation of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: XML 表示法<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the key information identity.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定索引鍵資訊的身分識別。

trans-unit.source: The key information identity.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵資訊的識別。

trans-unit.source: Loads a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo"></xref> state from an XML element.
trans-unit.target: 載入<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo"></xref>狀態從 XML 項目。

trans-unit.source: The XML element from which to load the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo"></xref> state.
trans-unit.target: 要載入的 XML 項目<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo"></xref>狀態。

trans-unit.source: The value parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The value parameter is .
